channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 drains completely blocked, 14th November
item.description:
2 drains adjacent to the alpaca farm blocked, location as annotated on the map

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain still blocked, 14th November
item.description:
This is the third November in a row where I have reported this blocked drain! When are yo actually going to clear it? It has been permanently blocked for more than two years and overflows whenever it rains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Close, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lighting, 14th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Kingsmead Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 14th November
item.description:
Email received 12/11/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that the gulley O/S the location is blocked and unable to cope during heavy rainfall. The excess water is running off onto the nearby drive; this has been flooded twice this year already. They ask that the drain is cleared out.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th November
item.description:
This year there was a tree survey carried out by the highways agency on a copper beech tree outside 24E and 24F Moorend road, Cheltenham. Talking to both the highways representative and tree assessment official after the assessment, they indicated that the tree would need its canopy severely reduced or felled completely due to the worsening condition of the tree (it has 2 large holes in it's trunk at the base of the canopy).
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The alley way is absolutely full of fallen leaves and is incredibly slippy with so many extra pedestrians having to use it. It is also uneven in places making it difficult to navigate., 14th November
item.description:
The entire alley needs to be swept, between London Road and Hartlebury Way (Glenfall Way)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Courtfield Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is no street lighting, 14th November
item.description:
There is no street lighting at the end of the alleyway from Laxton Road to Green Lane making it pitch black, impossible to walk through the gate safely particularly with wet leaves making it slippy under foot.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
